tasks.title: Implement claude-capability-manager MCP Server
tasks.description: Develop the core MCP server that handles dynamic capability detection, installation, and project initialization using FastMCP framework
tasks.details: Build Python-based MCP server using claude-code-sdk and FastMCP framework. Implement dual-mode operation (stdio MCP server and CLI tool). Core functionality includes: capability detection from PRDs, registry-driven MCP/subagent deployment, project scaffolding with .claude folder structure, template management for CLAUDE.md variants (bootstrap, step2, production). Support both new project and existing project workflows. Integrate with registry.yaml for capability mapping to required tools.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for capability detection logic, integration tests with registry.yaml, end-to-end project initialization testing, CLI mode validation, and error handling for failed tool deployments

tasks.title: Create Registry System and Project Bootstrap Workflows

Build existing project migration workflows with entry point detection.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate registry.yaml schema, test workflow execution, verify file operations, test git integration, validate project structure creation, and test rollback capabilities

tasks.title: Implement ingest-web-mcp with SearxNG Integration
tasks.description: Adapt existing ingest-web-mcp to integrate with SearxNG for web content ingestion and push results into Qdrant instead of Milvus
tasks.details: Modify ingest-web-mcp pipeline: SearxNG search with JSON format, URL deduplication using tldextract, content fetching with retries via tenacity, parsing using trafilatura with BeautifulSoup fallback, summarization into ≤200 tokens, embedding via Ollama nomic-embed-text (768-d), and upsert to Qdrant with project-specific collections. Implement content filtering for malicious domains and basic validation. Set up SearxNG Docker container on port 8080 with proper configuration.
tasks.testStrategy: Test SearxNG API integration, validate content parsing pipeline, verify Qdrant upsert operations, test embedding generation, validate content filtering, and test end-to-end web research workflows

tasks.testStrategy: Test subagent selection algorithms, validate phase-based deployment, test agent lifecycle management, verify capability matching logic, and validate community agent integration

tasks.title: Develop Claude Debugger MCP with QA Infrastructure
tasks.description: Build specialized MCP server for QA orchestration using Temporal workflows with Gitea, Kiwi TCMS, and ReportPortal integration
tasks.details: Implement Claude Debugger MCP as self-contained server with Temporal workflow orchestration.
